content: **this pattern is part of the summer 2024 collaboration between pom pom and hobbii** **size ** one size **finished measurements ** 15cm / 6 high x 18cm / 7 wide **materials ** hobbii friends cotton 8/4 mercerized 100% mercerized cotton 50 g 1 75 oz = 160 m 174 yds yarn a lilac 63 3 skeins yarn b pistachio 108 3 skeins bag is worked with 4 strands of yarn at once **hook ** 5 mm / us g crochet hook always use a hook size that will result in the correct gauge after blocking **gauge ** 3½ sts & 7 row = 10cm / 4 over puff st pattern on 5mm hook with 4 strands of yarn without blocking exact gauge is not essential but fabric should be firm **pattern information ** vitreous is worked from the base upwards the base is a flat rectangle made up of slip stitches and the body of the bag is made up of puff stitches worked in the round upwards from the base straps are applied to the sides of the bag from the bottom up four strands of yarn are held together throughout **find the pattern
